sub_title: French speaking Credit Controller & Export specialist
summary:
My personal business objectives are:

See new challenges as opportunities to develop professionally, rather than pressures 
Make an overall overview from a specific professional area;
Improve the process and push the business planning to achieve the best productivity; 
Progress from usefulness to productivity. 

My competences are focused on being imaginative in solving problems, being confident and persistent to realize achievement. My working method is to be structure minded, determined, prioritize, set goals and take the initiative to improve processes when needed.  In the professional life being faced with new situations,  make us able to learn more and improve . 

The most important main tasks for the Credit Controller : improving the cash flow, make sure that payment terms are respected,  valuing deadlines, in a timely manner  solving issues and respectively issuing invoices and credit notes when needed to maintain a good relationship with customers . 

By using the most the different talent a colleague can have; we can only make progress . There is no shame in asking for help; the shame is in not asking. The diversity can lead to success.
I adore the diversity which comes with business development and appreciate the cohesiveness between working creatively and analytically

Soft skills: Fast learner, tenacious, accurate, initiative taking, resolving issues before they become real problems, thinking on your feet and being energetic and sociable.
Professional skills: Good understanding and very big experience in both Receivables and customer service, business process minded, having a clear insight on all aspects of my role on the organisation, maintain a mature, gracious and professional manner when communicating with customers even when difficulties arise, ability to create a productive and professional relationship with customers on strong base, excellent written and spoken communication skills in French language and a good capacity to listen

-Drive and monitor daily Credit Control activities. 
-Contact customers by phone or email regarding overdue accounts to settle balances and also    proactively. 
-Reconciling debits and credit. 
-Constantly monitoring collection of the  outstanding receivables and systematically chasing up past due  receivables by  intensive collection calls (+/- 30 calls a days) and e-mails
-Assess the credit line of potential and existing customers and set credit limits in accordance with the insurance company (Atradius). 
-Analyzing and creating financial overviews.
-Take daily action on customers with blocked orders and release orders if possible. 
-Release or block orders in cutoff sales   
-Negotiate payment conditions and terms (payment plan, bank guarantee, cash in advance,  certified cheques, bank drafts) to ensure the orders are released and the risk is minimized
-Monitor continuously my portfolio to ensure all targets are met.
-Excellent judgment and strong problem solving skills, including the ability to  analyze and understand the financial impact of relevant options. A very significant reduction of the average payment  terms in France,   which improved by almost 35 days compared to the past. 
-The regular follow-up of co-operation with Customer Service, Sales team , Sales Support  and warehouse team to reach a  sound  decision to solve quickly any problem with customer and get paid in time. 
-Always a proactive approach by mailing twice a month the account statement to customer by e-mail  to be confirmed that they received all invoices and  no-dispute to have payment in time.  
-Launch of the Direct debit ( SEPA) for the  portfolio ( France). In the first 2 year 60% of the customers in France had joined the direct debit.
-The bad debts and the write off have significantly decreased. 
-The Not Yet Due (current) was in the 2 last years between 85 and 90% of the total balance.', 'title': 'Credit Controller', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 16233341, 'name': 'Merck Millipore', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGLcX0e5VJSqg/company-logo_400_400/0/1660625571455?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=apeHbPAvQ5IXEpS3-RdV9K0y0srmnvxKT0SGHMyuxnM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/merck-life-science/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'RÃ©gion de Amsterdam, Pays-Bas', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'company': 'Merck Life Science', 'description': '-Ensuring cash collection targets are met each month. 
-Monitoring overdue debtors, actioning significant risk issues and minimizing overall DSO (Days Sales Outstanding). 
-Communicating proactively and clearly with external and internal customers on significant issues (Sales Team, Credit Control colleagues, Managers) to indicate progress and resolve issues (product, price, and contract). 
-Increase number of clients satisfying contractual obligations by updating the Database in time for monthly invoicing and work on solutions to overcome barriers and improve scalability.
-Contacting customers regarding overdue accounts to settle balances immediately in full (or when appropriate working with customers to resolve accounts through payment plans, settlements and other collection tools).  
-Ensure that follow-up contact is established with customers in a timely manner. 
-Ensure that allocations issues are handled satisfactorily by working closely with the Cash application Team. 
-Ensure that Cash application Team promptly resolves allocation issues and communicates effectively the results. 
-Recognise and proactively communicate significant collections issues/risk; escalate them appropriately. 
-Identify and highlight credit notes and write-off concerns. 
-Actively note and document customer payment issues and communications. 
-Promote strong collaborative relationships between internal teams, especially the clients and Cash application team members.
-Proactive in increasing the number of accounts that pay by Bank Transfer. 
-Perform in accordance with business policy and procedures. 
-Handle issues and projects, whenever required.
-Coach new staff in the credit management & Customer Service
-solved issues and disputes with the key customers ( please see attachment)', 'title': 'French Credit controller for Key and Major Account also public account ( hospital, cnrs, inserm ...)', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Merck Life Science', 'description': '-Manage customer accounts and interact with customers to provide and process information in response to inquiries, concerns and requests about products and services.
-Answers phones, takes product orders, checks inventory availability or status of shipment, verifies customer pricing, prepares and processes customer return goods for credit and/or replacement.
-Interacts with and supports company sales representatives.
-Handle and resolve customer complaints
-Escalates requests and unresolved issues to the designated resource
-File records of customer interactions and transactions
-With the countless demands on the customer satisfaction, it was required to have people who can be trusted to carry out their responsibilities with minimal supervision
-Works also under general supervision with some instructions given for routine work and detailed instructions for new types of work or special projects', 'title': 'Customer Service representative', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 7963, 'name': 'IDEXX Laboratories', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQHI2TT2WFki8w/company-logo_400_400/0/1689943736935?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=WthXJk6HKjasnGxyweInCEaiUebe_8Qg9e61qzdgct0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/idexx-laboratories/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Schiphol', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'IDEXX', 'description': 'export  "challenging tasks"​
	
-Support to the sales team, ensuring all sales and service objectives were met. 	
-Responsible for a big part of customers, duties included answering customer queries, problem solving and providing detailed information on new products. 	
-Worked with new customers in the development of new accounts and the implementation of new arrangements. 	
-Assisted in the development of new policies . 	
-Performed market research surveys on customer needs and requirements. 		
-Generated repeat business through successful client follow-up. 
-Letter of credit & documents  for the bank  (invoice,  bill of lading or AWB, certificate of origin, and the other documents  requested by the customer)
-Coach new staff in the export team
-Entering and processing orders and quotations in SAP
-Coordinating international shipments in cooperation with internal and external  distribution personnel
-Contact person for customers and country managers regarding the status of orders, quotations and shipments
-First contact point for follow up and problem resolution of customers issues
-Responsible for issuing ( credit, rebill) invoices and adding freight charges when necessary
-Creating and maintaining organized (customer) files for information tracking, follow up and problem resolution .Other duties as assigned .

The challenge and first priority from my side was to develop my relationship building of trust with our clients and high customer satisfaction that translates into increasing higher revenue. It was the best barrier to competition and an excellent way to gain customers'​ loyalty
I was proud of myself to have participated in this project with my modest contribution and I knew at that time that I have succeeded in everything I have undertaken
After this first successful relationship, the entire Country Managers have enjoyed and were very positive about the business outcomes, which means the successful completion of our missions' regardless of the party involved', 'title': 'Export specialist level II', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 5619177, 'name': 'Cendant Membership', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cendant-membership/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maarssen', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'company': 'Cendant Membership', 'description': None, 'title': 'Sales area', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Exel Texas Instrument', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1998}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}}, 'company': 'Exel Texas Instrument', 'description': None, 'title': 'Shipment and controller specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}]
